overview: After a hot and heavy coupling with her ex-boyfriend, the King of Studs, John C. Holmes, Cheri meets up with another former lover who has a broken leg. The ex has no problem getting his putz to stand up straight, as Cheri gets him to gush like a geyser. He friends next door share a lovemaking feast, then, finally, everyone (and we mean everyone!) joins together in a good old-fashioned orgy.
title: Cheri
